title: Negro League Baseball Teams
name: Negro League Baseball Teams
description:
A Map by Catholicgauze

Map of notable teams in the various Negro Leagues.

This is an ongoing project.  If you have any information on more teams or corrections feel free to enter the information or contact me via e-mail catholicgauze at gmail dot com

A Geographic Travels with Catholicgauze! map.  http://catholicgauze.blogspot.com

properties.description: Posted by Catholicgauzeaka Little Rock Black Travelers

properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeMay 1, 1926 Stchel Paige made his Negro League debut with the Black Lookouts http://www.answers.com/topic/chattanooga-black-lookouts

properties.name: Chicago Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeAmerican Giants, Brown Bombers, Columbia Giants, Giants, Unions, and the Union Giants http://www.nlbpa.com/chicago_american_giants.html http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_Columbia_Giants http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_Giants http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chicago_Unions

properties.name: Cincinnati Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeBrowns, Buckeyes (moved to Cleveland), Clowns (formerly of Indianapolis), Cubans, and the Tigers

properties.name: Cleveland Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeBears, Buckeyes (formerly of Cincinnati), Elites, Hornets, Red Sox, Tate Stars, and the Tigers http://www.nlbpa.com/cleveland_buckeyes.html

properties.name: Columbus Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeElite Giants (later moved to Baltimore) and the Blue Birds (moved to Cleveland) http://www.answers.com/topic/columbus-blue-birds

properties.name: House of David
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeBaseball team for a local cult. House of David\'s team was an active touring team between the 1920s and 1950s http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/House_of_David

properties.description: Posted by Catholicgauze

properties.name: Indianapolis Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeABC\'s, Clowns, and the Athletics http://www.nlbpa.com/indianapolis_abcs.html http://www.nlbpa.com/indianapolis_clowns.html

properties.name: Jacksonville Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeDuval Giants played in Jacksonville until moving to Atlantic City in 1916. Rep Caps played 1938 in the Negro American League then moved to Cleveland.

properties.name: Jamestown Red Sox
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeMixed race team in the 1930s http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jamestown_Red_Sox

properties.name: Kansas City Monarchs
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeLongest Running Negro League Team. Team of Jackie Robinson and several other black pioneers in Major League Baseball. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Kansas_City_Monarchs

properties.name: Lousiville Teams
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeBlack Caps, Black Colonels, White Sox, and the Zulu Cannibal Giants http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Zulu_Cannibal_Giants

properties.name: Memphis Red Sox
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeOne of the few teams to own their own ballpark http://www.answers.com/topic/memphis-red-sox

properties.name: Milwaukee Bears
properties.description: Posted by CatholicgauzeOnly played in 1923 (12-41) http://www.answers.com/topic/milwaukee-bears
